title: Identifying active sites of Co3O4 catalysts for C2H2 oxidation using combined computational and experimental methods
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00358F, Paper
Jianlin Deng, Meng Gao, Meng Wang, Yaozhao Li, Weiyu Song, Lu Wang, Huiling Zheng, Jian Liu
Combined computational and experimental studies are carried out to unravel the role of active centers on C2H2 oxidation over Co3O4 catalysts.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
